mapper.insert: insert into question (id,title, coverUrl, user_id, state, createTime,content) values (#{id},#{title}, #{coverUrl}, #{user.id}, #{state}, #{createTime},#{content})
mapper.select: select id, title, coverUrl, user_id, state, createTime,content from question ORDER BY id DESC,state
select q.id, q.title, q.coverUrl, q.user_id, q.state, q.createTime,content,u.id u_id,u.nickName u_nickName,u.place u_place,u.headImgUrl u_headImgUrl from question q JOIN user u ON q.user_id = u.id

select q.id, q.title, q.coverUrl, q.user_id, q.state, q.createTime,content,u.id u_id,u.nickName u_nickName,u.place u_place,u.headImgUrl u_headImgUrl from question q JOIN user u ON q.user_id = u.id WHERE q.id=#{id}
